description:
Up for anything, the Nebula 32L is a one-pack wonder for travel or everyday. Its mesh back panel keeps you cool while spreading the weight to the waistbelt and shoulder straps. The dedicated laptop sleeve unzips completely and folds down for easy access at airport security. A huge clamshell opening makes it easy to pack and unpack, while lots of pockets keep you organized. Where will it take you next?

  • Made of durable 420-denier nylon packcloth
  • Webbing waistbelt can be deployed to help with heavy loads or removed when you don't need it
  • Wide clamshell zippered opening gives you easy access to the large main compartment
  • Secondary compartment has tons of internal organization with pockets and slots for pens, keys, cards and other items
  • Side stretch-mesh pockets hold water bottles or snacks
  • Dedicated zippered laptop sleeve is padded and set off the bottom of the pack to protect from drops
  • Separate sleeve carries your tablet
  • External zippered pockets hold quick-access items
  • Top pocket has a brushed lining to protect your sunglasses
  • Blinky light loop
name: Osprey Nebula 32 Daypack - Unisex
